name: Disconnected Demo
description:
* We are actively working on switching to a web build right now so things may be wonky! Use the downloadable .zip file below to play.

Disconnected is all about working together and using your teammates' abilities in creative ways. We made this demo in January 2022 to start to get a feel for what we need to do to really make our characters shine. Enjoy!

If you've got time for a quick survey afterwards, let us know what you think: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1qUT8l1NE01PdKpNAgQqi8l1l7m8FPAjVXVAhqgVtBgE/vie...

*Gamepad controller is required - Works with PS4 and Xbox controller

Once you have all your equipment, here are the controls:

Left trigger - Quick press to shoot or hold down to aim and press the attack button to shoot

Right trigger - Quick press or hold down to charge, release to fire. This ability can be aimed at any time with the right stick

Bumpers - Tell your party member to stay in a location, press again to recall them

South face button(X or A) - Dash

West face button(Square or X) - Attack or fire arrow when aiming
